sentences.sContent: Her amatory affairs ; a romantic adventure .
sentences.sCn: 她的恋爱故事：浪漫的冒险。

sentences.sContent: Be that I have blotted out our amatory tender shoot with own hands.
sentences.sContent_eng: Be that I have blotted out our amatory tender shoot with own hands.
sentences.sCn: 无论如何，我已经遮住了我们与自己的双手恋爱的嫩芽。

sentences.sContent: Age and obesity had made her inapt for love, but she took a keen interest in the amatory affairs of the young.
sentences.sContent_eng: Age and obesity had made her inapt for love, but she took a keen interest in the amatory affairs of the young.
sentences.sCn: 年龄和发胖已经使她自己不能再谈情说爱了，但是她对年轻人的恋爱事却极有兴趣。
